name: IDBCursorWithValue
description: The IDBCursorWithValue interface of the IndexedDB API represents a cursor for traversing or iterating over multiple records in a database. It is the same as the IDBCursor, except that it includes the value property.

refs.name: Indexed Database API 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'IDBCursorWithValue' in the 'Indexed Database API 2.0' specification.
